dataValueTemplate.annotation: select count(distinct pp.patient_id) from openmrs.patient_program pp where pp.program_id = 1 and pp.voided = 0 and DATE(pp.date_enrolled) >= :startOfPeriod and DATE(pp.date_enrolled) <= :endOfPeriod and pp.location_id = :locationId

select count(distinct pp.patient_id) from openmrs.patient_program pp where pp.program_id = 2 and pp.voided = 0 and DATE(pp.date_enrolled) >= :startOfPeriod and DATE(pp.date_enrolled) <= :endOfPeriod and pp.location_id = :locationId
